meaningMnemonic: You try to put your <radical>toe</radical> inside a <radical>shellfish</radical>, but it just won't open. That's because this shellfish has sworn an oath of <kanji>chastity</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: "<kanji>Chastity</kanji> is really important to me," the shellfish says. "But, maybe if you give me a <reading>ta</reading>ter (てい) tot, I'll change my mind."
